availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: G. J. Bosley (Springfield, Kentucky, merchant and justice of the peace)

body.p: Springfield, Kentucky, merchant and justice of the peace. Kentucky native. Married to Mary J. Bosley. Father of Frances E. Bosley, Harriet E. Bosley, Sarah E. Bosley, Martha B. Bosley, Charles Bosley, and Anne Bosley. Merchant in Springfield in 1860. Justice of the peace for the 1st District of Springfield in 1865.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Washington County, District No. 1, Springfield, p. 133-34; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Washington County, Springfield, p. 3.
